meta.title: Lucas Campos | Senior Full Stack Engineer
meta.description: Lucas Campos - Senior Full Stack Engineer specializing in robust web application development

profile.name: Lucas Campos
profile.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
profile.bio: Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience designing, developing, and deploying high-performance web applications. Specialized in building modern frontend and backend solutions with React.js, Node.js, and AWS. Experienced in cloud infrastructure, microservices, CI/CD practices, and Agile methodologies.

hero.description: Specializing in React.js, Node.js, AWS and Microservices with 8 years of professional experience.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience designing, developing, and deploying high-performance web applications. Specialized in building modern frontend and backend solutions with React.js, Node.js, and AWS. Experienced in cloud infrastructure, microservices, CI/CD practices, and Agile methodologies. Proven track record in increasing eCommerce conversion rates and improving process efficiency.

cards.title: Frontend Development
cards.description: Expert in React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, and modern CSS frameworks like Tailwind CSS. Focused on creating responsive and performant user interfaces.

cards.title: Backend Development
cards.description: Proficient in Node.js, NestJS, Python (Django, FastAPI), Express.js, and building scalable microservices architectures with RESTful APIs.

cards.title: Cloud & DevOps
cards.description: Experienced in AWS and GCP, implementing containerized microservices and CI/CD pipelines, with expertise in cloud-native development and infrastructure automation.

about.passion: I'm passionate about creating high-performance web applications with a focus on security, scalability, and exceptional user experience. My approach combines technical expertise with a deep understanding of business requirements.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.description: My professional journey in software development across various roles and organizations.

achievements: Developed e-Wallet and crypto trading features of an online banking portal with React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and AWS, achieving sub-2 second load times and a 5% conversion lift.
Led a Node.js backend team of 4 to build a high-conversion eCommerce platform, improving conversion rates by 2.5%.
Integrated cross-platform mobile features using React Native and Expo for seamless access on iOS and Android.
Deployed CI/CD pipelines via Azure DevOps, reducing release cycles by 30%.
Collaborated in Agile/Scrum teams with developers, designers, and product owners.
Developed a data-driven gift web application, boosting efficiency by over 50% and achieving 99.9% accuracy.
Architected and deployed a computer simulation game site, optimizing SEO and increasing user base by 20%.
Implemented Kubernetes container orchestration to improve deployment efficiency by 5%.
Established monitoring and proactive logging frameworks to enhance observability.
Designed and optimized full-stack web applications using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB for finance and education clients.
Built and maintained RESTful APIs using Express.js, Apollo Server, and GraphQL for real-time data visualization.
Managed AWS EC2, S3, and API Gateway infrastructure, and implemented Infrastructure as Code using CloudFormation.

projects.title: Key Projects
projects.description: Highlighting some of my most impactful work and technical achievements.

list.title: Cycling eCommerce Site
list.description: Supervised backend development for a high-traffic eCommerce platform aimed at electric bikes. Achieved a 2.5% increase in conversion rates.

list.title: Banking Portal Project
list.description: Contributed to a secure and performance-optimized online banking portal using React.js, Next.js, and AWS. Reduced page load time to under 1 second.

list.title: Computer-simulation Game Site
list.description: Developed a computer-simulation gaming platform using Node.js, GraphQL, Prisma ORM, and AWS S3 for game asset delivery. Increased SEO rankings by 20%.

skills.description: A comprehensive overview of my technical skills and professional competencies.
